title: End of season honor 5 reward, where is it?
body: I logged into game, and the end of season honor 5 reward chest popped up, so i pressed Claim, and thats it, I cant seem to find it, i suppose it should be in loot, but its not, i restarted the game but still nothing, maybe its somewhere else, anyone having the same issue?

replies.body: Hey there, grats on the ward!  It will be automatically available in your ward skin selection, no looting required.
Any plans to add the option to view wards skins without queuing?

> [{quoted}](name=PiousMonk,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BKj13HEv,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2017-11-11T22:56:26.142+0000)
>
> Any plans to add the option to view wards skins without queuing?

I think they're planning on adding that to "collection" along with your champ skins that you own
i never got this at all....
The most boring reward for not flaming for an entire season.

Hi MajaBambino,

The **Honor Ward Skin** does not go into your inventory at all, it is immediately available to use. You can check this by starting a custom game and checking your list of wards during champion select.

(_The ward skin should also show up in your Purchase History. **Store** > **Account** (to the right of the **Purchase RP** button) > **Purchase History**_)
same happened to me. :/
update: the reward is actually a ward looking like the lvl of your honor. in champ select i could see it in the ward list as "honor reward"
Same thing happend for me , and i can't find any cpsule

Hey guys can anyone help me?  I have received honor level 5 before Season 7 ended, but I can't seem to find it in my selection during queues.  Is there a fix for this?  I also have not been banned or suspended in any way possible so I haven't lost my honor levels.  Please help.{{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

I had the same issue and I'm also having trouble because I'm not receiving blue essence after the games I play after I received my refunds at the beginning of the season. What can I do to fix or is it a bug?
Go to custom game pick you champ, lock in, then select your wards option and you can see it there. along with any other wards you have. Honostly now i kinda want 3 and 4 XD
so how do you view your ward skins? with the new rune system (though I'm only playing arams, may be why) you don't see a spot now in selection to change a ward skin....
Same here please help, idk what is going on!!!!!

> [{quoted}](name=MajaBambino,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BKj13HEv,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-11-11T08:41:14.934+0000)
>
> I logged into game, and the end of season honor 5 reward chest popped up, so i pressed Claim, and thats it, I cant seem to find it, i suppose it should be in loot, but its not, i restarted the game but still nothing, maybe its somewhere else, anyone having the same issue?

I got to honor level 5 and havent even recieved an honor capsle, let alone a ward skin
I guess that's just how it's supposed to show up. You see a picture of a chest but there's nothing to actually open. A bit lazy and confusing on their part, but a gift's a gift.

I had the same question but this thread solved it. Rito must have called in Phreak just to get that sweet re**ward** pun in there :P

{{champion:245}}
I have this problem too , i receive the chest but now i can t find it ..
Same
same happened to me, should it be among the ward skins?
Same here.

> [{quoted}](name=Klax9,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BKj13HEv,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-11-11T09:14:22.915+0000)
>
> Same here.

actually, it's the ward skin.
